Package com.hygenics.crawler

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActivitiesStack  
    BreakMultiple
    Breaks apart Records with Multiple Entries.
    DumptoText  
    ExecuteProcess  
    Generate  
    GenerateInput
    This class generates input in for loops from specified parameters
    getDAOTemplate
    The Data Source for the Page Grab
    GetImages
    This class pulls images from a mapping and puts them into a table using the basic jdbcconn (there is only one query needed).If an image requires a cookie, then allow for the images to be grabbed with the individual pages using the appropriate command.
    GetIndividualPages
    The purpose of this code is to Get Individual Pages.
    GetPages
    Pulls pages.
    HTMLParseObject
    Stores the Individual HTML and results for parsing as an attempt to reduce memory usage.
    ImageObject  
    IndividualPage  
    MainApp
    Main Application for Crawler that handles processing.
    Merge
    With the data so widespread, this tool helps merge everything together or perform other queries.
    ParseDispatcher
    Sets up and parses for single and multiple regex patterns This class creates a dispatcher that may be useful when used across multiple machines as well.
    ParseLinkReg
    The callable class that implements the regex.
    ParseLinks
    This Step's sole responsibility is to parse links using multithreading Processor results in case of need Fork Join Pool: 70% max Custom Thread Pool: 66% max Executor Service: 50% max
    PostObjects  
    PullObject
    Pull Object
    RunTransformation
    This Class Runs an Existing Pentaho Transformation that is Saved in .ktr or .xml format
    Send
    The Class that sends the PDA email of completed jobs and their record counts.
    Truncate
    The Truncate Class Which Truncates a Table
    UpdateFiles
    This class updates the files that are used to track and store progress of the crawlers.
